channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MAZ Loader – Preloader Builder for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MAZ Loader – Preloader Builder for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24669|2024-08-03T19:42:16.136Z -- unknown -- maz%20loader%20%E2%80%93%20preloader%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MAZ Loader – Preloader Builder for WordPress plugin before 1.3.3 does not validate or escape the loader_id parameter of the mzldr shortcode, which allows users with a role as low as Contributor to perform SQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2021-24668|2024-08-03T19:42:16.152Z -- unknown -- maz%20loader%20%E2%80%93%20preloader%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MAZ Loader WordPress plugin before 1.4.1 does not enforce nonce checks, which allows attackers to make administrators delete arbitrary loaders via a CSRF attack
